name: Shoot and Hook
description:
"Shoot and Hook" is an action-platformer where your single goal is to kill all enemies across some procedurally generated rooms. But do not forget, the more skill you display in dealing with your foes, the more points you earn! Try to complete the game without touching the ground :P

Controls

W,A,S,D — Move

Space — Jump (Air Jump)

Left mouse button — Shoot

Hold right mouse button  — Use Grappling Hook

Shift — Slow motion

Escape — Pause
